content.description: The crux of this one is whatever technique is your least favorite - there is face climbing, smearing, and crack.... Could it get any better?
content.location: This is the second bolted line in the Hallway.

content.description:
This is the dirty crack across from

The Hallway

trad route (west side of The Hallway). The crux is the opening move to reach the crack. After the opening sequence, follow sustained climbing up the finger crack which leads to the top. The movement is enjoyable, but the climb is dirty and short. To retrieve your anchor gear, there is an easy downclimb off the back of the climb into a separate corridor.
content.protection: A select set of finger-sized cams and nuts.
content.location:
This ascends the dirty crack across from

The Hallway

content.description: This is a fun-looking crack on the far left side of the hallway. Look up and left as you pass the large boulder that sits in the way of the entrance to the hallway.
content.location: This is the leftmost route in The Hallway. Look for anchors as the crack widens.

content.description: This starts with descent hands followed by a short section of OW and then finishes with good hands. There are plenty of cracks for anchor opportunities. To retrieve your anchor gear, there is an easy downclimb off the back of the climb into a separate corridor.
content.protection: A select set of hand to large hand sized cams. A BD C4 #5 can be helpful.
content.location:
It is the obvious crack directly across from

The Bearhug

(on the west side of The Hallway).

content.description: Crux at bolts 5 and 6. Fun route.
content.location: If you are headed south from the Headstone, this is the first bolted route on your left.

content.description:
This is the obvious crack directly across from

Sideslot

(west side of The Hallway). A good hand crack with plenty of gear options make this a great 5.6 lead for a new trad leader. Downclimb on easy ledges (south) to the base of the route.
content.protection: A select set of hand-sized cams.
content.location:
Directly across from

Sideslot

(west side of The Hallway), this is the obvious crack.

content.description: A one-move wonder I suppose. This route has a lone bolt down low.
content.protection: One bolt, then you're on your own til the anchors. (gear)
content.location: Look for the lone bolt across from the tree. Follows the crack to the top.
